short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: filter your timeline by groups of users

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filter your Twitter timeline by groups of users to see only their tweets. Only want to see most recent tweets from "news" accounts? Or you want only to see the tweets from "tech" accounts? Then create a "news" group or a "tech" group and add those account names in there.
